hooks.post-tool-call:
if [ "$TOOL_NAME" = "Edit" ] || [ "$TOOL_NAME" = "Write" ] || [ "$TOOL_NAME" = "MultiEdit" ]; then echo '🏗️ BuildMate: Code change detected, checking for errors...'; if npm run type-check && npm run lint; then echo '✅ No errors found, committing BuildMate changes...'; git add -A && git commit -m "✨ Auto-update: BuildMate AI construction platform improvements

🤖 Generated with Claude Code
🏗️ BuildMate AI - UK Construction Platform

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>"; else echo '❌ Errors found in BuildMate codebase, skipping auto-commit'; fi; fi
